name: @akilles/soundcloud-watcher
description: OpenClaw plugin to monitor SoundCloud account and track artist releases

scripts.postinstall:
echo '
âœ“ SoundCloud Watcher installed!

Next steps:
1. Get API credentials: https://soundcloud.com/you/apps
2. Add to ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json:

   "soundcloud-watcher": {
     "enabled": true,
     "config": {
       "clientId": "YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
       "clientSecret": "YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET",
       "username": "your_soundcloud_username"
     }
   }

3. Restart: openclaw gateway restart
4. Verify in chat: /soundcloud-setup
'

author: Akilles William Lindstedt
